text: usamen khulee nishaaniyaan hain, (jinamen) maqaame[1] ibraaheem hai tatha jo koee us (kee seema) mein pravesh kar gaya, to vah shaant (surakshit) ho gaya. tatha allaah ke lie logon par is ghar ka haî€¼ja anivaary hai, jo usatak raah pa sakata ho tatha jo kufr karega, to allaah sansaar vaasiyon se nisprh hai
